locations.name: One Farrer Hotel
locations.description:
Sleek hotel complex above Farrer Park metro, 4 km from Chinatown and 6 km from Singapore Botanic Gardens. Modern rooms, apartments, and villas with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and rainfall showers. Dining options include a buffet restaurant, trendy bar, hip cafeteria, and international eatery. Outdoor pool, spa, 24/7 gym, chocolate shop, meeting space, and ballroom.

Check-in: 15:00
Check-out: 12:00.

locations.name: Carlton Hotel Singapore
locations.description:
Situated a 7-minute walk from Suntec Convention and Exhibition Centre, this upscale hotel is 5 minutes from Bras Basah metro station and a 13-minute walk from Clarke Quay's dining and nightlife. The refined rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screens, rainfall showers, and amenities like desks and coffee/tea makers. Studios feature panoramic city views, while upgraded options include access to a private lounge with complimentary breakfast and snacks. The hotel boasts three restaurants, a bar, and a patisserie. Additional amenities include an outdoor pool, spa, gym, and meeting rooms.

Check-in time: 14:00
Check-out time: 12:00.
